data.name: Baladins
data.detailed_description:
BALADINS

Buskers, party animals, troublemakers... People gave them many names, but they call themselves Baladins! They travel from one town to another to fulfill their noble quest: entertainement!



A hard task with many faces. They can sing, dance, cook and throw a party. One day they help the community, and the other they create chaos! They can be glorious, they can be annoying, and they are always unexepected!

Their name is as old as the land itself and their origin long-forgotten. Their deeds are told in the folktales, to amuse or to inspire. Their legend precedes them and give hope and joy to the people.

PICK A CHAMP


Choose between four original heroes! Each busker has a unique skill, from cooking to fireworks, dance or luxomancy (the ancient magic of being very very good at fixing lamps).
Don't judge a book by its cover, and check characteristics and classes while picking your champ!

EXPLORE THE WORLD


Travel the strange lands of Gatherac and unravel all its secrets and legends. Everybody knows a good myth is based on some truth, and myths may be a lot closer than you think.
The turn-based exploration allows every player to feel the thrill of unveiling new places along the way!

CHOOSE YOUR OWN PATH: ONE STORY, MANY ADVENTURES


Every decision taken can affect the world around, and you're the one in charge! Tailor your adventure as you go but be ready to face the consequences.
The decisions you have to make are not moral choices, but creative approaches that will have very different outcomes!

BOOST YOUR HERO


Shape your character and their strengths to fit your favorite playstyle. Gather oddball items to benefit their powers, for better or worse.
Plan your characteristic upgrades according to your goals and find items to increase it even more!

AND BUCKLE UP FOR YOUR BIGGEST CHALLENGE

Brace yourselves for all the pitfalls you'll meet along the way, whether you choose to follow your own path or to go full on the rescue mission to save Gatherac!
You never know what can hit you in here, but one thing is for sure: there is a dragon to be taken care of!!

Key ingredients

    • Focused on narratives: Stories don't leave anyone behind. Anybody can pick up the game no matter how much of a gamer they are.
    • Make your own adventure: Only you can decide which path to follow and which quests to pursue!
    • The more, the merrier: Gather your friends, adventures are meant to be shared and hard tasks get easier when you have the whole band with you!
    • 1-hour game sessions: No time for 95-hour games anymore?
    • Replay to access more content! Unlock storylines, places and characters for your next session.
    • Unique world building: A new fresh take on the heroic fantasy universe, full of twists and twirls!

data.short_description: Baladins is a choose-your-own-story multiplayer game (1-4 players online) inspired by Role-Playing Games. A whole campaign with friends, packed in 1-hour sessions!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 / 8.1 / 10 x64
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630 / Radeon HD 6570
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 8 / 8.1 / 10 x64
  • Processor: 3.5 GHz processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 / Radeon HD 7570
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
